product_description: Kitchen & Bath Siliconized Acrylic Caulk is an advanced formula fortified with silicone for long-lasting flexibility and excellent adhesion to ensure a protective barrier against moisture. It provides a watertight seal around kitchen and bath fixtures and cures to an ultra-smooth, satin finish.

name: Red Devil 0785 StormGuard 920 100% RTV Silicone Sealant, A Water-Resistant Adhesive for Interior and Exterior Use, 2.8 oz. Tube, White, 1-Pack
short_description: WEATHER-RESISTANT SEALANT: The one-part, neutral cure, 100% RTV silicone sealant is specially formulated for weather-resistant external window & door applications such as skylights, aluminum siding, trim, gutters, vents, and pipes

EXCELLENT ADHESION TO VARIOUS SURFACES: This 100% Silicone Sealant can be used on a variety of indoor and outdoor surfaces and adheres to metals, painted and unpainted wood, glass, plaster/drywall, brick, plastic, and vinyl
WILL NOT CRACK, SHRINK OR PEEL: With its Superior Flexibility, the multi-purpose sealant will withstand the elements and won't crack, peel or shrink for a dependable seal that lasts for years
LOW ODOR FORMULA: The advanced formula sealant is VOC compliant and boasts a low odor, and is USDA Recognized, ideal for use in enclosed spaces like bathrooms

FOR BEST RESULTS: Before applying the sealant, remove any old caulk, debris, or other residues that might interfere with adhesion and make sure the architectural grade RTV Sealant is used on clean, dry surfaces for best results
product_description: StormGuard-920 is a one-part, 100% RTV silicone sealant formulated for use anywhere there is a need for a water-tight and or airtight seal. This product forms a strong, durable, flexible, seal for joints by providing excellent adhesion to most non-porous surfaces. It is specially formulated for weatherproofing external window & door applications. It can be exposed to rain in 30 minutes and is non-corrosive, not paintable and requires a solvent for clean-up. Made in the USA.
